com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize

Class _EntitlementAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize._EntitlementAction

  • public class _EntitlementAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to manage 'Entitlement' entities through Drools rules engine

                                    EntitlementBean entBean,
                                    Paging paging)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing entitlements according to the entitlement filter given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entBean - entitlement filter
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of entitlements found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findEntitlement

        public static <any> findEntitlement(DAO sql,
                                    java.lang.Boolean published,
                                    EntitlementBean entBean,
                                    Paging paging)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing entitlements according to the entitlement filter given and the published Boolean filter given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entBean - entitlement filter
        published - Boolean filter: 1)true - published entitlements 2)false - not published entitlements 3)null - skips the use of this filter, anyway if the 'published' attribute of the entitlement filter is set, it is considered
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of entitlements found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findEntitlementByName

        public static <any> findEntitlementByName(DAO sql,
                                          java.lang.String name,
                                          int entitlementType)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the entitlements that have the name given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        name - name of the entitlement to find
        entitlementType - entitlement type filter, it must be between 1 and 3. If it is out of this range it is ignored.
        Returns:
        list of entitlements found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addEntitlementChild

        public static void addEntitlementChild(DAO sql,
                                       EntitlementBean entitlementChildBean,
                                       EntitlementBean entitlementParentBean)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        The method associates the entitlement entitlementChildBean as child of entitlementParentBean. NOTES: An application role can't be parent of a business role. A permission can't be parent of another entitlement.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entitlementChildBean - child entitlement, mandatory
        entitlementParentBean - parent entitlement, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addEntitlementChild

        public static void addEntitlementChild(DAO sql,
                                       <any> entitlementChildBeans,
                                       EntitlementBean entitlementParentBean)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        The method associates the given list of entitlements as children of the entitlement given. NOTES: An application role can't be parent of a business role. A permission can't be parent of another entitlement.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entitlementChildBeans - list of entilements to associate to the parent
        entitlementParentBean - parent entitlement, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkHierarchy

        public static int checkHierarchy(DAO sql,
                                 EntitlementBean entitlementChildBean,
                                 EntitlementBean entitlementParentBean)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        The method checks if it is possible to hierarchize the two entitlements given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entitlementChildBean - entitlement filter, mandatory
        entitlementParentBean - parent entitlement filter, mandatory
        Returns:
        An int number that identifies the situation: -1 if there are already loops into the hierarchy of the parent entitlement, -2 if there are already loops into the hierarchy of the child entitlement, -3 if the parent and the child are the same entitlement, 0 if the hierarchy is possible, > 0 if the child entitlement already has the parent entitlement into its hierarchy
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • revertEntitlementHistory

        public static void revertEntitlementHistory(DAO sql,
                                            EntitlementBean entitlementBean)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        The method provides to revert the history of the entitlement given. It performs a rollback of the revision of the entitlement to the previous revision. All the modification made after the previous revision are canceled.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entitlementBean - entitlement filter, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
